frontmatter.title: I Wrote a YAML Parser From Scratch in Zig. Here’s What I Learned.
frontmatter.preview: I’m writing a software architecture visualization program in Zig that allows both developers and designer easily navigate a codebase and understand product functionality. Since it combines automatically generated data with human input, I needed a data format that was easy to generate from different languages, yet also easy to edit by hand. So, I went with YAML.
